reviews.review_msg: He is an excellent and very inspirational professor, who is passionate about teaching.  His tests and essay is super easy, and it's impossible to do badly unless you are lazy.  Only bad thing is that the textbook he uses  (that he wrote) is poorly written, and jumps to quickly from subject to another subject...

Awesome prof!  Super energetic and into his lectures.  Never a dull moment.  His exams are straight from the textbook and he doesn't try to trick you.  I'm trying to take as many more classes with him as I can.  Not bad looking for an old guy too ;)
